name: @danielhaim/slugify
description: A multilingual tool for generating SEO-friendly slugs from strings.

scripts.release: npm version patch && npm run build && git add -A && git commit -m 'Release: v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")' && git push && npm publish
scripts.release-patch: npm version patch && npm run build && git add -A && git commit -m 'Patch Release: v$(node -p "require("./package.json").version")' && git push && npm publish
scripts.release-major: npm version major && npm run build && git add -A && git commit -m 'Major Release: v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")' && git push && npm publish
scripts.release-minor: npm version minor && npm run build && git add -A && git commit -m 'Minor Release: v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")' && git push && npm publish
